title: India has prominent role in rule-making for fintech solutions, DPI: Dammu Ravi
description: India is also trying to build and help countries in the global south with DPI (Digital Public Infrastructure). "For a long time, India has always been a rule-taker. We just complied with the rules made by the global community, largely driven by the Western nations. But in the fin-tech solutions, fin-tech technologies, and the DPI world, India has an eminent role to play in rule-making because most of the technologies are made in India," Ravi said while addressing Global Fintech Fest in Mumbai.
